dcterms:description: A dataset of coronary arteriography reports collected from Shanghai Shuguang Hospital, containing five types of entities and six relations. The dataset is split into training, development, and test sets in an 8:1:1 ratio.
dcterms:title: Shanghai Shuguang Hospital Coronary Angiography Dataset
